summary: First is the cruise control - it sometimes work, sometimes does not.   But when it does, it will at times kick on and off while in use.  Scary at times.  The next is the loss of power on the freeway.  there are times when it will just bog down and not accelerate. other times it will catch and shift hard, other times will jerk.  when these times occur, the check engine light comes on.  But then will go off after a period of minutes.
